channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump knows who to blame for 2 American citizen deaths in Minnesota: ‘Democrat ensued chaos’
item.description: Trump refused to back away from his pledge to carry out the largest deportation program in history.

item.title: A crypto social media network’s failure raises an awkward question: Is blockchain good for anything beside finance?
item.description: Some blame Farcaster’s flop on its leadership team, but its challenges went much deeper.

item.title: Yes, you’re getting a bigger tax refund. Your kids won’t thank you for the $3 trillion it’s adding to the deficit
item.description: I'm the president and CEO of the Tax Foundation. We expect 71% of taxes to be paid by the top 20% of earners in 2026.

item.title: Netflix’s Best New Show Lands A Perfect 100% Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: Netflix has a brand new show that has landed a perfect 100% Rotten Tomatoes score from critics, but it's not exactly clear why.

item.title: A Talk With Peter Koerte, The ‘Future Architect’ Amid Siemens' Bet On Industrial Intelligence
item.description: In a free wheeling discussion, CTO and CSO of Siemens AG, Peter talks about the Mega Trends, Technologies of the future, and Siemens big bet on Indust...

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Tuesday, January 27
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: ‘Highguard’ Arrives Today In A Cloud Of Mystery: When To Play, What To Watch
item.description: Highguard is finally launching in the wake of zero promotion after its big Game Awards debut. Here's when to play.

item.title: Republican groundswell for ICE investigation grows after second killing of American citizen in Minnesota
item.description: Alex Pretti's killing comes at a sensitive moment for the GOP as the party prepares for a challenging midterm election year.

item.title: The quiet erosion of HR’s power
item.description: HR seems to be losing jurisdiction over the workforce in the age of AI.

item.title: How ArenaNet Is Modernizing ‘Guild Wars’ Without Remaking It
item.description: ArenaNet breaks down how Guild Wars: Reforged keeps a classic MMO relevant without erasing its identity in our interview.

item.title: Stocks rebounding from last week’s losses. Gold, silver surge. Get live updates.
Big Short's Michael Burry sees risks to U.S. stocks from a stronger yen

FDA upgrades cookie recall to highest danger level over undeclared peanuts
item.description: The FDA upgraded the Gregory's Foods cookie dough recall to its most serious risk category over the potential presence of undeclared peanuts.

item.title: Nvidia CEO says AI boom will create 'six-figure' construction jobs
item.description: Jensen Huang calls AI infrastructure development the "largest buildout in human history," creating massive job opportunities and wage growth for skill...

item.title: Trump says he's 'not a huge fan' of 401(k) withdrawal plan for homebuyers' down payments
item.description: Trump says he's "not a huge fan" of letting homebuyers tap 401(k) retirement accounts for down payments, citing strong account performance amid market...

item.title: Mortgage rates tick higher but remain near 3-year low

item.title: Elon Musk says Tesla will likely sell humanoid robots by end of next year

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
